boardgame.name: Hrdina v kostce
Roll Player
骰筑英雄
롤플레이어
boardgame.description: Mighty heroes don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t just appear out of thin air -- you must create them! Race, class, alignment, skills, traits, and equipment are all elements of the perfect hero, who is ready to take on all opposition in the quest for glory and riches._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Roll Player, you will compete to create the greatest fantasy adventurer who has ever lived, preparing your character to embark on an epic quest. Roll and draft dice to build up your character_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s attributes. Purchase weapons and armor to outfit your hero. Train to gain skills and discover your hero_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s traits to prepare them for their journey. Earn Reputation Stars by constructing the perfect character. The player with the greatest Reputation wins the game and will surely triumph over whatever nefarious plot lies ahead!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
